name: Pad Thai
short_description: Thailand's beloved national dish bursts with flavor as rice noodles stir-fry with succulent shrimp, crunchy peanuts, and fresh bean sprouts. A perfect balance of sweet, salty, and tangy, it’s a must-try culinary experience!

name: Thai Curry
short_description: Rich coconut milk melds with fragrant galangal and shrimp paste, creating a luscious stew that celebrates Thailand's vibrant culinary heritage. Tender chicken simmers to perfection in this soupy delight.

name: Tom yum
short_description: A vibrant Thai classic, this spicy and sour seafood soup bursts with the flavors of fresh shrimp, aromatic lemongrass, and zesty lime. Perfectly balanced, it warms the soul and tantalizes the taste buds.

name: Green Curry
short_description: Fiery and fragrant, Thailand's green curry blends rich coconut milk with zesty galangal and aromatic lemongrass. Each spoonful delivers a harmonious balance of spice and sweetness, embodying the essence of Thai cuisine.

name: Yellow Curry
short_description: Originating from Thailand, the vibrant yellow curry delights with its rich blend of coconut milk and aromatic spices like coriander and lemongrass. Tender tofu, chicken, or duck absorb the flavors, creating a comforting stew that's both hearty and fragrant.

name: Red Curry
short_description: Bursting with vibrant flavors, this Thai stew harmonizes creamy coconut milk and aromatic red curry paste with tender tofu, chicken, and seafood. A comforting staple, it warms the soul with every bite.

name: Papaya salad (Som tam)
short_description: A vibrant staple from Thailand's Isaan region, green papaya salad bursts with zesty lime, fiery chilies, and crunchy peanuts. Each bite offers a refreshing balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

name: Tom kha gai
short_description: Savor the rich, aromatic blend of tender chicken simmered in creamy coconut milk, infused with zesty galangal and lemongrass. This iconic Thai soup delights with its balance of heat from bird's eye chilies, reflecting the country's vibrant culinary heritage.

name: Massaman Curry
short_description: Originating from Muslim communities in Southern Thailand, this mild and sweet stew melds tender beef or chicken with creamy coconut milk, potatoes, and aromatic Massaman curry paste for a comforting delight.

name: Khao soi
short_description: A beloved specialty from Northern Thailand, khao soi features tender meat simmered in a rich coconut milk broth, served over egg noodles and topped with crispy noodles for a delightful crunch.

name: Phanaeng Curry
short_description: Originating from Thailand, this rich stew combines tender meats with creamy coconut milk and aromatic panang curry paste. Its salty-sweet peanut notes and lime zest create a delightful, comforting experience.

name: Curry Paste
short_description: Originating in Thailand, Gaeng showcases vibrant yellow, red, or green hues, each varying in spice. Bursting with aromatic herbs and spices, this versatile curry paste elevates any dish with its rich, complex flavors.

name: Khao niao mamuang
short_description: Steamed glutinous rice is drenched in rich, sweetened coconut milk, creating a delightful balance of creamy and chewy. A beloved Thai dessert, it perfectly concludes any meal with its tropical charm.

name: Roti canai
short_description: Golden and flaky, this pan-fried flatbread delights with its buttery layers and crispy edges. Enjoy it with curry or sweetened condensed milk for a taste of Southeast Asian comfort.

name: Phat kaphrao
short_description: Savor the vibrant flavors of Thailand with this aromatic stir-fry, where minced pork or chicken meets fragrant holy basil, garlic, and chili. Each bite bursts with a perfect balance of savory and slightly sweet notes, delivering a taste of authentic Thai cuisine.

name: Kai yang
short_description: Grilled to perfection, this whole marinated chicken bursts with the savory flavors of soy sauce, ginger, and white pepper. Originating from the Lao people, it’s a beloved Thai street food staple.

name: Ruam mit
short_description: A beloved Thai dessert, Ruam mit delights with a medley of chewy tapioca pearls, tender taro, and vibrant sweet potato, all bathed in creamy coconut milk and subtly infused with pandan.

name: Khao phat
short_description: Stir-fried to perfection, this Thai staple features fragrant jasmine rice tossed with vibrant vegetables and a hint of soy. A beloved comfort food, it captures the essence of Thai home cooking.

name: Larb
short_description: Heavily seasoned with aromatic herbs and spices, this meat salad features toasted ground rice for a delightful crunch. A beloved staple in Laos, it bursts with fresh flavors in every bite.

name: Pla thot
short_description: Crispy and golden, this Thai favorite features whole fish fried to perfection, capturing the essence of traditional street food. Delight in its savory crunch, often paired with zesty dipping sauce.

name: Grass Jelly (Chao kuai)
short_description: Originating from traditional Thai cuisine, this refreshing dessert combines silky grass jelly with crushed ice and a drizzle of rich brown sugar, creating a delightful balance of textures and flavors.

name: Nam phrik
short_description: Originating from Thailand, nam phrik bursts with vibrant flavors from bird's eye chilies, zesty lime juice, and fragrant garlic. Traditionally pounded in a mortar, it offers a perfect balance of heat and freshness, making it an essential accompaniment to many dishes.

name: Phat si-io
short_description: Originating from Thailand, this beloved street food features thick rice noodles stir-fried with soy sauce, fresh vegetables, and your choice of protein, delivering a savory and satisfying flavor with every bite.

name: Khanom khrok
short_description: Delight in these Thai coconut pancakes, where creamy coconut milk and rice flour meld together in small, crispy rounds. Baked in traditional iron pans, they offer a sweet and savory experience, perfect for any time of day.
